section.title: <xar:else />
section.t: Separates template code within an <xar:if /> tag. When the condition of the <xar:if /> tag is true, the template content preceeding <xar:else /> is executed. Otherwise, the template content after <xar:if /> is executed. When <xar:elseif />is used within an <xar:if /> block, <xar:else /> must appear last.

section.title: Forms
section.t: This tag has only an empty form
